item.title: Uber invests $100M in WeRide to fuel robotaxi expansion across 15 more cities
item.description: Uber has committed $100 million to Chinese robotaxi firm WeRide as they expand to 15 more cities.

item.title: Amazon to invest $4B in Chile to launch AWS infrastructure region
item.description: Amazon is making a sizable investment to support new and existing Amazon Web Services (AWS) customers in Chile. The tech conglomerate announced on Wed...

item.title: 9 Best Mechanical Keyboards (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We’ve typed thousands of words to help you find the ideal clacky—or thocky—mechanical keyboard for your refined taste.

item.title: D’Addario XPND Pedal Power Battery Kit Review: Get Juiced
item.description: This kit lets you build custom-length power cables for a cleaner-looking pedalboard for your instrument.

item.title: CrowdStrike says it will lay off 500 workers
item.description: The cybersecurity company said it will lay off 5% of its global workforce.
